client.net
Class ServerConnection

java.lang.Object
  client.net.ServerConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkingIn
public class ServerConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkingIn

Contacts all the methods which should be called upon receipt of a command from the server.
